com.ftdichip.ftd2xx

Class DeviceDescriptorRev5

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftdichip.ftd2xx.DeviceDescriptor
      • com.ftdichip.ftd2xx.DeviceDescriptorRev5

  • public class DeviceDescriptorRev5
extends DeviceDescriptor
    Extends the DeviceDescriptorRev4 with new fields available for revision 5 devices.

    For a more detailed description of the fields see the ftd2xx-API specification.
    Author:
    Mike Werner
